Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: Several people have recently reported on Federal Treasurer Jim Chalmers' visit to the United States to attend key economic meetings ahead of the Federal Budget which is now just a few weeks away. The Treasurer's trip provided him with a deeper understanding of the challenges Australia is facing and he is confident that he has a clear picture of what needs to be done. A few people have raised concerns about the upcoming Federal Budget so it will be a critical test of Chalmers' economic prowess to ensure that it is well-balanced and reflects the needs of all Australians.
